mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Rankin, Christopher, 1788-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Encloses paper [on line of West Florida] found in volume of Jefferson's now in Library of Congress; rights of land cannot be found in records Spanish government left at Natchez and are jeopardized by claims derived from British government; hopes proclamations by Spanish government mentioned in this paper will recall to Jefferson's mind information which will be of help; asks to have paper returned.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1822 March 20, Washington [D.C.] to Thomas Jefferson, n.p.
